data.title: JKIA Yellow Taxi Cabs Nairobi Airport transfer services
data.meta_description: jkia taxis Taxi services at jkia cabs Transfers- Nairobi Kenya by Taxi, Shuttle transfers to city hotels Wilson Airport Cabs Transfers Nairobi JKIA Taxi Cab
data.meta_site_name: Nairobi Airport Transfers | Transfers, Meet, Assist and Tours
data.text:
JKIA Taxis Nairobi Airport Transfers & Hotel Pick-Up & Drop-Off Services.Taxi transfers from and to Jomo Kenyatta International Airport, Kenya

Nairobi JKIA airport transfers services, Airport services between Jomo Kenyatta International Airport and city hotels and Nairobi hotels near Wilson airport and Jomo Kenyatta airport eg Parkside hotel,Hotel boulevard, Hilton hotel, silver springs hotel, fairviewhotel ,Norfolk hotel, LaicoRegency hotel ,hotel intercontinental,680,comfort inn,mayfair,safari park and windsor golf club.

We also conduct Transfers ,drop offs and pick-ups between Nairobi tourists destinations and others such as Nakuru, Kisumu, Kakamega, Kericho, Eldoret, chogoria,Nyeri, Nanyuki, Mombasa, Namanga, Arusha, Moshi and Dar-es-salaam. You can choose to be dropped in either of the following vehicles.

We maintain a fleet of well-serviced fully insured vehicles for hire by those clients wishing to explore Kenya on their own. Those vehicles can also be hired by business people or professionals on short assignments which require constant movement.

We offer group rates,private hire and discounted long term hire services.Kenya Car & Bus Hire in Kenya,Mombasa:private bus hire Transportation Book a group private hire company where we offer you Bus transport in Tourist licensed Vehicles.Instant Messaging NOW

Note: Rates given below are from Nairobi JKIA airport to City Hotels for other destinations .Taxi transfers from and to Jomo Kenyatta International Airport, Kenya
